MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA6 postcode area of Ayr. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30am to repair broken equipment on the overhead line network at Lower Rankinston and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.46am on Monday 1st March 2021.
